name: Candy Ghost (Spooktober Jam)
description:
You are cursed and must create the Halloween ghosts. For that you must give Ghost Candy to all kids that knock at your door, but you must act fast. Any miss you became the ghost. Cops are also going look for the missing kids, so you need to mask the truth from them.

Atari style Arcade :)

Game made for the Spooktober Jam (Oct 2020)

Commands: 

  • A or ◄ Left
  • D or ► Right
  • W or ▲ Jump
